attributes.action: remove all groups from facebook making fun of madeline mcann
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we want you the prime minister to remove any sick groups forming on facebook about madeline mcann as it was not long ago when in the press her parents went with facebook in search for their daughter.These groups should not be here esp as her parents are campaining on facebook for her safe return.These groups approve of her fate it as knocked people to the core kind regards ellis twins

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
